title: Democrats accuse oil firms of 'decades of deception'
content: Companies are accused of having spent decades denying their products' role in fuelling climate change.

title: Biden announces revamped $1.75tn spending plan
content: The president said that his party was "on board" though the scaled-back plan's fate is uncertain.

title: Moscow shops and restaurants shut in new lockdown
content: Russia closes non-essential services and sends workers home amid record Covid deaths.

title: UK boat detained by France amid fishing rights row
content: A minister says his officials are "urgently" investigating the situation surrounding the detained boat.

title: DNA confirms man is Sitting Bull's great-grandson
content: A sample of the Native American leader's hair confirms the identity of his great-grandson.

title: Dramatic footage captures tornado on Texas highway
content: The twister flung trees and cars into the air and affected 100 homes, officials said.

title: Hundreds of sea turtles wash up dead in Mexico
content: Scientists think the turtles may have become tangled in abandoned fishing nets and drowned.

title: Laos makes Asia's largest ever drug bust
content: A truck was carrying 55 million amphethamine tablets and over 1.5 tonnes of crystal methamphetamine.

title: No more super skyscrapers, says China
content: The decision is being seen as part of a larger bid to crackdown on vanity projects.

title: China rations diesel amid fuel shortages
content: It is likely to contribute to the global supply chain crisis and inflation, analysts told the BBC.

title: US issues first gender-neutral 'X' passport
content: The document has an "X" in the gender box, to show the holder does not identify as male or female.

title: Saudi child protester who faced execution released
content: Ali al-Nimr, who was arrested when he was 17, was originally sentenced to death by beheading.

title: Ruth Negga on 'passing as white' movie
content: Based on the 1929 book by Nella Larsen, the film tells the story of childhood friends who meet in later life.

title: New York schools ban Squid Game Halloween costumes
content: The primary schools have warned parents about the Netflix series' "violent messages".
